headline: American Tower: Well-Covered 4% Dividend Potentially Attractive For Income-Oriented Investors (Rating Downgrade)
summary: American Tower offers strong Q3 results, solid AFFO growth, a strong balance sheet, rising mobile data demand, and a near-4% yield. Learn why AMT stock is downgraded to hold.
